analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Akusalaṁ upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: akusalam upādānam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ no upādānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Akusalaṁ kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: akusalam kilesam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ no kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate pañca
